name: Keyboard Klicker
description:
A one-week prototype for the GSAS 4510 Experimental Game Design course at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. The theme of this project is "Idle Games".

How to Play

  1. Type the word as you see on the screen, and finish the word with a [SPACE] to earn bonus characters.
  2. Open the shop [TAB] and use the number keys to purchase upgrades.
  3. Use purchased Regex Actions [.] or [*] to easily fill in parts or whole words. Upgrades with arrow brackets (i.e. <.> or <Aa>) indicate passive upgrades.
  4. Watch number go big.

Sources

  • Keyboard Typing Sounds by Fesliyan Studios and edited by Corppet
  • Powerup Sounds by Game Sound Solutions
  • Piano in a Wood Cabin (BGM) by VOiD1 Gaming
  • All other assets and source code by Corppet

\ + P = cheater
